actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act of 1968, as amended, to include the Goodnight and Goodnight-Loving Trails for study as National Historic Trails.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to include for study as national historic trails: (1) the Goodnight Trail, extending from Fort Sumner, New Mexico, to Cheyenne, Wyoming; and (2) the Goodnight-Loving Trail, extending from Concho, Texas, to Denver, Colorado.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act of 1968, as amended, to include the Goodnight and Goodnight-Loving Trails for study as National Historic Trails.
